demote.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The sergeant was demoted to private.
demote.translation[0].definitions[0].not: Demote is often used in the passive
demote.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to give someone a job with a lower rank or position than they had before
demote.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Constructive dismissal can include demoting you or reducing your salary.
After a Cabinet reshuffle, he was demoted to Deputy Education Secretary.
He was demoted from his position as chairman of the board last April.
